resources.string: It is recommended that you pump 8-10 times within a 24 hour period. This app will calculate based off those numbers, but we allow users to choose their own preferences in the options menu. Please consider creating your own timing interval.
How Often To - Pump Breast Milk
The buttons on the main screen set timers for either the Left or Right breast
The Settings options will allow you to set a custom interval (in hours)
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
